Weâ€™re preparing Lubuntu 17.10, Artful Aardvark, for distribution in October 2017. With this second alpha you can get a glimpse of what the next version will contain. We have some interesting things happening, so read on for highlights and information.

'''NOTE:''' This is the Alpha 2 pre-release. 
Lubuntu Pre-releases are NOT recommended for:
* Regular users who are not aware of pre-release issues.
* Anyone who needs a stable system.
* Anyone uncomfortable running a possibly frequently broken system.
* Anyone in a production environment with data or workflows that need to be reliable.

Lubuntu Alpha 2 pre-releases ARE recommended for:
* Users who want to help us test by finding, reporting, and/or fixing bugs. You can find more about helping to test and bug triage at <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/Testing| Lubuntu testing]]</nowiki>.
* Lubuntu developers.
* People wanting to see and test how the current snapshot of Lubuntu 17.10 will look and behave.

=== Getting Lubuntu 17.10 Alpha 2 ===

The full listing of available images is <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/lubuntu/releases/artful/alpha-2/ | here]]</nowiki>. You must <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/HowToMD5SUM|check]]</nowiki> both the download and then the ''' check install media''' on 1st boot before attempting an install. Instructions for burning the image to a CD / DVD or copying to a USB flash drive can be found on the <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BurningIsoHowto|Burning ISO Howto]]</nowiki>.

== Known Problems ==

=== Lubuntu Applications ===
This is our list of known bugs affecting applications that Lubuntu uses but relies on others to maintain.

* gnumeric menu ->help ->about gnumeric -> license button, does not work. (<nowiki>[[https://pad.lv/1516454|1516454]]</nowiki>)
* abiword text cursor and border start to flicker. (<nowiki>[[https://pad.lv/1574278|1574278]]</nowiki>)
* unable to unlock session after suspend. (<nowiki>[[https://pad.lv/1656399|1656399]]</nowiki>)
* Software properties gtk implies my cpu is unknown and not working. (<nowiki>[[https://pad.lv/1444682|1444682]]</nowiki>)
* gparted does not recognize the iso9660 file system in cloned Ubuntu USB boot drives. (<nowiki>[[https://pad.lv/1622313|1622313]]</nowiki>)
* gnome-disks shows three icons in menu of lxpanel. (<nowiki>[[https://pad.lv/1666693|1666693]]</nowiki>)

=== Lubuntu-specific Bugs ===
These are maintained by the Lubuntu team.

==== LXDE ====

* run dialog called from one desktop opens on the desktop with preferences dialog, regardless of which desktop is current (<nowiki>[[https://pad.lv/1445818|1445818]]</nowiki>).
* changing multiple desktop names only results in the first being changed. (<nowiki>[[https://pad.lv/1522625|1522625]]</nowiki>).

==== Lubuntu Installer ====

* '''All images require a DVD or USB. As a workaround, use the <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Lubuntu/Alternate_ISO#CD_image|server or netboot]]</nowiki> images.'''
* Lubuntu 16.10 slideshow still incorrectly showing Lubuntu Software Center (<nowiki>[[https://pad.lv/1633148|1633148]]</nowiki>).
* GTK warning about "The :insensitive pseudo-class is deprecated. Use :disabled instead." in Lubuntu 16.10 installer output (<nowiki>[[https://pad.lv/1633135|1633135]]</nowiki>).
* Lubuntu Zesty ubiquity welcome dialog not shown. (<nowiki>[[https://pad.lv/1667453|1667453]]</nowiki>)

== Feedback ==

Development of Lubuntu 17.10, the Artful Aardvark, is ongoing and bugs are fixed every day. Before reporting bugs, please ensure your system is up-to-date. For verifying installation related bugs, updated disk images are available from <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/lubuntu/daily-live/current/|Daily created images for standard PCs, laptops and netbooks]]</nowiki>.

Please feel free to <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/ContactUs|contact us]]</nowiki> with feedback.
